alert.note: Alert for Faulkner; White (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 5:41PM CDT until July 12 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Faulkner County in central Arkansas... West central White County in central Arkansas... * Until 615 PM CDT. * At 541 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Enola, or 16 miles east of Conway, and is nearly stationary. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Vilonia... Enola... Mount Vernon... Holland... Barney... Hamlet... El Paso... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
